Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Indeed , the incidence of liver transplantation and death in this group was 11 . 7 % if patients had jaundice at presentation , whereas the corresponding figure was 3 . 8 % in nonjaundiced patients ( P < . 04 ) .

Let's think step by step.

There are no chemical entities mentioned in the given paragraph. The paragraph discusses the incidence of liver transplantation and death in jaundiced and non-jaundiced patients. Jaundice is a clinical condition characterized by the yellowing of the skin and eyes due to the accumulation of bilirubin in the body. However, it is not a chemical entity itself but a symptom or condition.
